title: What advantages and disadvantages does Tesla have in creating full self-driving technology over other companies? - Quora

response.answer_text: What advantages and disadvantages does Tesla have in creating full self-driving technology over other companies? Teslas approach is gradual, it trains its system as data from existing cars comes in.And it uses cheaper hardware - cameras, sonar, radar. Advantage? Once ready, it will work on any road - known, unknown, changed. Disadvantage?The alternate approach, using HD pre-mapped roads, HD maps and Lidar seems to be the faster approach. It’s more expensive in hardware and needs another car “already being there” and has problems with road construction or other obstacles - but you were asking about Tesla and not Waymo.

Advantages: large amounts of on road data which may or may not be rather samey No particular requirement or expectation to make a profit Disadvantages religious refusal to countenance lidar or other non camera based sensors Musk tweets. as an example, their latest level 2 beta is being trumpeted as full self driving. It is level 2. That is not self driving, it is driver assistance.
